decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, to comply with Adopted Policies B1 and ES6 and Replacement Policies 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9. | The proposed velux window in the side elevation of the roof approved shall contain only obscure glass, and shall be permanently fixed shut.  A sample of the obscured glass, no smaller than 300 mm square shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority before any work is commenced on the relevant part of the development, and the development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the sample thus approved.  The details so approved shall be retained permanently.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, to comply with Adopted Policies B5 and H33 and Replacement Policies 4.1 and 5.9.
description: Provision of pitched roof to existing flat roofed addition at rear, with new door and canopy to replace exisitng window for flat 5
